title: feat: add quick code snippet referencing in prompts

body: This PR introduces a quick way of referencing code snippets in your chat window's prompt input field. The selected code can be included in the prompt via: - Main editor context menu - Highlighted code floating toolbar - Keyboard shortcuts: - Windows: CTRL + SHIFT + I - macOS: CMD + SHIFT + I https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/2fddc681-f310-4195-b5ff-d70cffa3d39f
